name: Vegan Potato Soup
description: This vegan potato soup is the ultimate comfort food for cold days! It's super creamy, rich, and very easy to make! And it's ready in just 30 minutes!
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup full fat canned coconut milk

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the potatoes and cut them into medium-sized cubes. Slice the white and light green parts of the leek and rinse them well. Set both aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Peel the potatoes and cut them into medium-sized cubes. Slice the white and light green parts of the leek and rinse them well. Set both aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the onion. Then heat some oil in a large pot and sauté the onion for about 3 minutes. Add the garlic and cook it for another minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Finely chop the onion. Then heat some oil in a large pot and sauté the onion for about 3 minutes. Add the garlic and cook it for another minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the potatoes and the leek and cook for 5 minutes. Then add the vegetable broth and the bay leaf. Simmer for 15 minutes or until the vegetables are very soft.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the potatoes and the leek and cook for 5 minutes. Then add the vegetable broth and the bay leaf. Simmer for 15 minutes or until the vegetables are very soft.

recipeInstructions.text: Fish out the bay leaf and discard. Reserve some of the cooked potatoes and leek for later if you want your soup to be a bit chunky. Purée the soup with a hand-held immersion blender until smooth. Alternatively you could also use a standard blender to purée the soup (see instructions in the recipe notes).

Purée the soup with a hand-held immersion blender until smooth. Alternatively you could also use a standard blender to purée the soup (see instructions in the recipe notes).

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the coconut milk, the dried thyme, the lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately and sprinkle it with chopped green onion, parsley, and chives. Enjoy!
